title: Evriholder Kitchen Sponges Super Absorbent Dish Cleaners made with Sustainable Bamboo Fiber, Pack of 3
features: PREMIUM QUALITY: Fabric is made of 95% sustainable bamboo fiber and 5% polyester
VERSATILE KITCHEN CLEANERS: These sponges are super absorbent and soft, yet durable enough for any kitchen cleaning task
LONG-LASTING: With regular care they will last for years, unlike traditional sponges which need to be replaced regularly.

SAFE FOR ALL KITCHEN SURFACES: Never worry about scratching or damaging non-stick, stainless steel, copper, ceramic, or any other surface in your kitchen. These sponges are tough on grime but gentle on your valuable pots and pans.
EASY TO CLEAN: Simply toss these reusable sponges in the washing machine periodically and lay them flat to dry.
description: Bring the lushness and natural beauty of bamboo to your home with the Bamboo Naturals Collection of cleaning tools. Each item is thoughtfully designed for maximum functionality and durability. These sponges are made of 95% sustainable bamboo. These sponges last longer than traditional sponges, so they don't need to be replaced as often. Super absorbent and ideal for dishes, stove tops, and kitchen counters, they're the versatile cleaning tool you've been looking for. They are safe for use on all surfaces. To refresh, simply wash with your clothes in the washing machine and lay flat to dry.
